summary: A subtle remodel of Breezehome with a few Thieves Guild easter egg items througout the rooms.
descriptionHtml:
I had been searching for a remodel of Breezehome that added enough extras to be functional but not lore breaking. I found a Breezehome Crafting mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8278
(credit to the mod author for these areas) BUT it still didn\'t feel right. Borrowing the model from the crafting mod I remodeled it and all the rooms.

Crafting area will be unlocked when you purchase the Lab area to upgrade your home.
 
CHANGES:

ver. 1.1a
-Finally found a fix for the mannequin issue. They will not ghost in the livingroom before taking their place.
 
ver. 1.1
-WARNING! Removed chest in far room of crafting area near the ore shelf. Replaced it with a different chest. Remove items from old chest before updating!
-Added display cases to crafting area and livingroom.
-Adjusted lighting with new knowledge to enhance affects.

ver. 1.0
-Removed, changed and readjusted lighting in all rooms to flow and light rooms better.
-Added Thieves Guild easter egg items throughout the house.
-Major remodel to livingroom setup.... feels more lived in.
-Added more maniquins, weapon display, and bookshelves to rooms.
-Removed the old Lab walls near kitchen to create an open friendly reading/sitting room.
-Replaced all funiture where needed with Noble furniture.

  With all changes made I stayed true to Lore and made sure to not break an immersive atmosphere.
author: Blank_Man261

files.name: Breezehome_Remodeled_Thief Guild Flare 2
files.changelogHtml:
WARNING! Removed chest in far end of crafting zone near the ore shelf. Replaced with existing one on other room. Remove items from that chest before adding mod.
Added a few display cases to crafting room and livingroom areas.
